name: The Adventures of Bally - A Platformer
name_original: The Adventures of Bally - A Platformer
description:
Hello, this is my first game I am making that is on Construct 3. 

You are Bally. You need to get to the end portal by going up. This is the first game of a series of maybe 3 one player games.  

**This game is under construction and there might be a few bugs. Sorry for the inconvenience**

You can find sequels and different versions of the game here:

Bally 2 player
